hero.title: Create meme-worthy moments in seconds
hero.description:
FancyMeme turns a short prompt into a share-ready meme with smart template picks and punchline ideas.
Tweak captions, switch formats, and post fast.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Have another question? Email us at support@fancymeme.com.

items.question: Do I need design skills?
items.answer: No. Start with a prompt and tweak the result in the editor.

items.question: Can I edit the text and layout?
items.answer: Yes. You can adjust captions and placement before exporting.

items.question: How does template matching work?
items.answer: The AI suggests a template that fits your idea, and you can switch anytime.

items.question: Can I use memes commercially?
items.answer: Make sure you have the rights to any assets you upload or use.

items.question: What can I export?
items.answer: Download images ready for social posts and sharing.

cta.title: Make your next meme in minutes
